title: Meditating with John Vervaeke - Day 28 - Live Stream Mon-Fri 09:30 EST
description:
Please join me for a daily meditation live stream every weekday at 09:30 AM EST. In these challenging times, meditation can help ground us and cope with stress.

Here is the playlist for this Meditating with John Vervaeke series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLND1JCRq8VuhdS9IL92M2jLmzAo3dHkJT

Mondays are slightly longer with a lesson, 15 minute sit, and time for questions. Tuesdays to Fridays are 15 minute sits with time for questions.

You can support my work on Patreon, with the proceeds going into the research I do at the University of Toronto on the Meaning Crisis and the cultivation of wisdom here: https://www.patreon.com/johnvervaeke
